p: The usage frequencies of traditional medicines in DPMs and YPMs are shown in Figure 3. Glycyrrhiza uralensis Fisch (Gancao), Panax notoginseng (Burk.) F. H. Chen (Sanqi), Angelica sinensis (Oliv.) Diels (Danggui), Astragalus membranaceus (Fisch.) Bge. Var. mongholicus (Bge.) Hsiao, and Astragalus membranaceus (Fisch.) Bge. (Huangqi) are the most frequently used genuine medicinal materials in Yunnan Province. The other medicines included in the SYNP as Dai medicines or Yi medicines are listed in Table 2.
